alert.note: Alert for Osage; Pawnee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 6:59PM CDT until May 02 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OSAGE AND SOUTHEASTERN PAWNEE COUNTIES... At 659 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Osage, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Sand Springs... Hominy... Cleveland... Barnsdall... Wynona... Jennings... Westport... Osage... Hallett... Blackburn... Terlton... Walnut Creek State Park... Tallant... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
